overview: George is the founder and CEO of Opal Labs, a Portland, Ore.-base start-up that’s leading the movement to fundamentally change the way the world does business. Opal’s social enterprise technology unlocks the innovation potential of people and allows organizations to cultivate radically collaborative and innovative cultures. George is working with global innovators like Arup, Method and BP to deploy a powerful ecosystem of apps like Opal Brainstorms – designed to revolutionize the way teams work with each other to solve the biggest problems facing businesses, and the world, today. For more information, visit www.workwithopal.com.
